channel.title: How to add donator rank to my Client & Server - Please
channel.description:
Hey guys, I really appreciate you for viewing this, if you guys know how to do this please give me some help, I have a donator rank I've found and I've noticed on some servers that they added it so it shows next to the name when they talk & yell, just for donators. heres the image link: http://i36.photobucket.com/albums/e36/elvensbane/donator.png
[img]http://i36.photobucket.com/albums/e36/elvensbane/donator.png[/img]
If you could help me add this it would be very much appreciated! - thanks.
